info.name: Reserve-API
info.description: Welcome to the Reserve API collection, where you can explore and interact with endpoints related to booking, trips, and locations. This collection provides a comprehensive set of APIs for managing reservations, accessing trip details, and retrieving location information.

item.name: Trip

request.description:
This endpoint allows you to create a new trip by sending a POST request to the database. The request should include a payload with various trip details such as seats, amenities, categories, bus name, bus number, origin, destination, departure date, arrival date, departure time, arrival time, fare, and owner ID.

Upon a successful execution, the API will return a status code of 201 along with a JSON response indicating the success of the operation and providing details of the newly created trip, including its unique identifier, departure and arrival dates, origin, destination, owner ID, departure and arrival times, categories, seats, bus number, amenities, fare, bus name, and other related attributes.

Example response:  

``` json
{
    "success": true,
    "trip": {
        "uid": "Ypd6TflCdbZ4Xw7GbqyUb7cF6Es1",
        "departureDate": "2023-12-18T00:00:00.000Z",
        "arrivalDate": "2023-12-22T00:00:00.000Z",
        "origin": "deeg (bharatpur)",
        "destination": "balotra (barmer)",
        "ownerId": "sjdhfi485h8",
        "departureTime": "2024-01-04T06:22:14.880Z",
        "arrivalTime": "2024-01-04T06:22:14.880Z",
        "categories": [
            "seater",
            "ac",
            "sleeper"
        ],
        "seats": [
            "A2",
            "A4",
            "C5",
            "B2"
        ],
        "busNumber": "bus123",
        "amenities": [
            "blackets",
            "toilet",
            "movie",
            "water bottle"
        ],
        "fare": 33,
        "busName": "comfortexpress",
        "_id": "659672367c09ae7b5d6e122e",
        "__v": 0
    }
}

 ```

This endpoint sends an HTTP GET request to the database. It retrieves a list of trips with details such as ID, user ID, departure and arrival dates, origin, destination, departure and arrival times, categories, seats, bus number, amenities, fare, bus name, and owner ID.

The response will have a status code of 200, indicating a successful request. The response body will contain a boolean "success" flag and an array of "trips" with their respective details.

Example response:

``` json
{
    "success": true,
    "trips": [
        {
            "_id": "6582f899f9499aa3854fc825",
            "uid": "BvlNcEDSCnVwKeW04YSqXdLOSJ82",
            "departureDate": "2023-12-20T00:00:00.000Z",
            "arrivalDate": "2023-12-24T00:00:00.000Z",
            "origin": "Jaipur Urban (Jaipur)",
            "destination": "Jaipur Rural (Jaipur)",
            "departureTime": "2023-12-20T14:21:17.476Z",
            "arrivalTime": "2023-12-20T02:21:17.477Z",
            "categories": [
                "ac"
            ],
            "seats": [
                "A1"
            ],
            "busNumber": "RJ80SH3949",
            "amenities": [
                "emergency contact number"
            ],
            "fare": 37,
            "busName": "Jaipur Travels",
            "ownerId": "cbb3f10e-8e5e-4607-8c1f-7efa00ba3c20",
            "__v": 0
        }
    ]
}

 ```

This endpoint makes an HTTP GET request to retrieve trip details based on the provided origin and destination. The request parameters include "destination" and "origin", specifying the destination and origin locations for the trip search.

The response to the request has a status code of 200 and includes a JSON object with a "success" field indicating the success status of the request. Additionally, the response contains an array of "trips" with details such as trip ID, UID, departure and arrival dates, origin, destination, departure and arrival times, categories, available seats, bus number, amenities, fare, bus name, and owner ID.

Please note that the request does not include a request body.

Example response:

``` json
{
    "success": true,
    "trips": [
        {
            "_id": "6593b270ee052b07c6edeab1",
            "uid": "Ypd6TflCdbZ4Xw7GbqyUb7cF6Es1",
            "departureDate": "2024-01-02T00:00:00.000Z",
            "arrivalDate": "2024-01-06T00:00:00.000Z",
            "origin": "deeg (bharatpur)",
            "destination": "balotra (barmer)",
            "departureTime": "2024-01-01T18:50:28.691Z",
            "arrivalTime": "2024-01-02T11:53:28.692Z",
            "categories": [
                "ac",
                "seater",
                "sleeper"
            ],
            "seats": [
                "A1",
                "A3",
                "A2",
                "A4",
                "A5"
            ],
            "busNumber": "rj234jf3453",
            "amenities": [
                "water bottle",
                "blackets",
                "movie",
                "charging point",
                "toilet",
                "emergency contact number"
            ],
            "fare": 12345,
            "busName": "tripura motors",
            "ownerId": "7e73d875-4905-49b2-a3c8-be59ef9c1eb1",
            "__v": 0
        }
    ]
}

 ```

item.description: Create new trips, fetch trip details, and explore a variety of trip-related functionalities.

item.name: Booking

body.raw:
{
    "uid": "Ypd6TflCdbZ4Xw7GbqyUb7cF6Es1",
    "name": "jhon doe",
    "email": "jhondoe@gmail.com",
    "phone": "+919876543219",
    "age": "35",
    "gender": "male",
    "busName": "fake bus",
    "origin": "jaipur urban (jaipur)",
    "destination": "jaipur rural (jaipur)",
    "departureDate": "2023-12-31",
    "arrivalDate": "2024-01-05",
    "departureTime": "11:37",
    "arrivalTime": "22:41",
    "amount": 12887,
    "currency": "usd",
    "description": "Payment for bus reservation from jaipur urban (jaipur) to jaipur rural (jaipur) on 2023-12-31 at 11:37 for passenger noreya noreya.",
    // Provide valid stripe token here
    "token": {
        "card": {},
        "id": "tok_1OU2R4SDctmq1t5tSB9jwQ3u"
    },
    "seats": [
        "A1",
        "B2",
        "A3",
        "A5"
    ]
}

request.description:
This endpoint allows you to create a new bookingby sending a POST request to the database. The request should include a payload with various booking details such as seats, amenities, categories, bus name, origin, destination, departure date, arrival date, departure time, arrival time, amouont, token etc.

Upon a successful execution, the API will return a status code of 201 along with a JSON response indicating the success of the operation and providing details of the newly created booking, including clientSecret and other booking details.

Example response:

``` json
{
  "success": true,
  "booking": {
    "uid": "xyz456",
    "name": "John Doe",
    "email": "john.doe@example.com",
    "phone": "+1234567890",
    "age": 25,
    "gender": "Male",
    "busName": "ComfortExpress",
    "origin": "CityA",
    "destination": "CityB",
    "departureDate": "2024-01-15",
    "arrivalDate": "2024-01-20",
    "departureTime": "12:00",
    "arrivalTime": "18:30",
    "seats": ["A1", "A2"],
    "amount": 100,
    "currency": "usd",
    "description": "Standard booking",
    "token": {
      "id": "tok_1234567890",
      "card": {
        "brand": "Visa",
        "last4": "1234",
        "exp_month": 12,
        "exp_year": 2025
      }
    }
  },
  "clientSecret": "secret_key_for_client",
  "_id": "659672367c09ae7b5d6e122e",
  "__v": 0

}

 ```

This endpoint retrieves booking details based on the provided user ID.

The request should be sent as an HTTP GET to {{BASE_URL}}/booking with the query parameter "uid" set to the user ID.

The response will have a status code of 200 and will include a JSON object with a "success" key indicating the success status, and a "bookings" array containing the booking details. Each booking object in the array will have various properties such as ID, uid, name, email, phone, age, gender, bus details, travel details, seats, amount, currency, description, and token.

Note: No request body is required for this endpoint.

Example response:

``` json
{
    "success": true,
    "bookings": [
        {
            "_id": "6593bbaa9f59bda0ca8558e5",
            "uid": "0UgSwLeMJ9Vs4NoTCLvexntpRTf2",
            "name": "noreya noreya",
            "email": "noreya8930@royalka.com",
            "phone": "+919876543219",
            "age": 33,
            "gender": "male",
            "busName": "tripura motors",
            "origin": "deeg (bharatpur)",
            "destination": "balotra (barmer)",
            "departureDate": "2024-01-02T00:00:00.000Z",
            "arrivalDate": "2024-01-06T00:00:00.000Z",
            "departureTime": "2024-01-01T18:50:28.691Z",
            "arrivalTime": "2024-01-02T11:53:28.692Z",
            "seats": [
                "A1",
                "A8",
                "B6",
                "C4",
                "D2"
            ],
            "amount": 12345,
            "currency": "usd",
            "description": "Payment for bus reservation from deeg (bharatpur) to balotra (barmer) on 2024-01-02T00:00:00.000Z at 2024-01-01T18:50:28.691Z for passenger noreya noreya.",
            "token": "tok_1OU2R4SDctmq1t5tSB9jwQ3u",
            "__v": 0
        }
    ]
}

 ```

item.description: Create new bookings, retrieve booking details, and manage user reservations.

item.name: Location
item.description: Access location-related APIs to retrieve information about different districts.
